original: na ca pūrvakāryopamamarde kāraṇasya svātmopamarde bhavati /

piṇḍa ādi vyatirekeṇa mṛd ādeḥ asattvāt ayuktam iti ced piṇḍa ādi pūrva kārya upamarde mṛd ādi kāraṇam na upamṛdyate
ghaṭa ādi kārya antare pi anuvartate iti etat ayuktam
piṇḍa ghaṭa ādi vyatirekeṇa mṛd ādi kāraṇasya anupalambhāt iti ced
na mṛd ādi kāraṇānām ghaṭa ādi utpattau piṇḍa ādi nivṛttau anuvṛtti darśanāt
sādṛśyāt anvaya darśanam na kāraṇa anuvṛtteḥ iti ced na
piṇḍa ādi gatānām mṛd ādi avayavānām eva ghaṭa ādau pratyakṣa tve numāna ābhāsāt sādṛśya ādi kalpanā anupapatteḥ
na ca pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ viruddha avyabhicāri tā
pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt anumānasya sarvatra eva anāśvāsa prasaṅgāt

original: yadi ca kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ tadevedamiti gamyamānaṃ tadbuddherapyanyatadbuddhyapekṣatve

tasyāḥ api anya tad buddhi apekṣa tvam iti anavasthāyām tad sadṛśam idam iti asyāḥ api buddheḥ mṛpā tvāt sarvatra anāśvāsa tā eva
tat idam buddhyoḥ api kartṛ abhāve sambandha anupapattiḥ
sādṛśyāt tad sambandhaḥ iti ced na
tat idam buddhyoḥ itaretara viṣaya tva anupapatteḥ
asati ca itaretara viṣaya tve sādṛśya grahaṇa anupapattiḥ
asati eva sādṛśye tad buddhiḥ iti ced na
tad idam buddhyoḥ api sādṛśya buddhi vat asat viṣayatva prasaṅgāt
asat viṣaya tvam eva sarva buddhīnām astu iti ced na
buddhi buddheḥ api asat viṣaya tva prasaṅgāt
tat api astu iti ced na
sarva buddhīnām mṛṣātve satya buddhi anupapatteḥ

atas siddhaḥ prāk kārya utpatteḥ kāraṇa sadbhāvaḥ

original: yadvi loke prāvṛtaṃ tama ādinā ghaṭādivastu tadālokādinā prāvaraṇatiraskāreṇa vijñānaviṣayatvaṃ prāpnuvatprāksadbhāvaṃ na vyabhicarati /

original: ghaṭādikāryasya dvividhaṃ hyāvaraṇaṃ mṛdādāravibhaktasya tamaḥkuḍyādi prāṅmṛdo 'bhivyaktermṛdādyavayavānāṃ piṇḍādikāryāntararūpeṇa saṃsthānam

original: tamaḥkuḍyādi hi ghaṭādyāvaraṇaṃ ghaṭādibhinnadeśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na tathā ghaṭādibhinnadeśe dṛṣṭe piṇḍakapāle /

analyzed: tayā a vipariluptayā nityayā dṛṣṭyā svarūpa bhūtayā svayan jyotiḥ samākhyathetām anityām dṛṣṭim svapna vuddhāntayoḥ vāsanā pratyaya rūpām nityam eva paśyan dṛṣṭeḥ draṣṭā  /
bhavati
evaḥ ca sati dṛṣṭiḥ eva sva rūpam asya agni auṣṇya vat
na kāṇādānām iva dṛṣṭi vyatiriktaḥ draṣṭā
tat brahma ātmānam eva nityadṛś rūpam adhyāropita anitya dṛṣṭi ādi varjitam eva avet vidita vat
nanu vipratiṣiddham na vijñāte vijñātāram vijānīyāḥ
iti śruteḥ vijñātuḥ vijñānam
na evam vijñānāt na vipratiṣedhaḥ
evam dṛṣṭeḥ draṣṭā iti vijñāyate eva

original: anyajñānānapekṣatvācca - na ca draṣṭurnityaiva dṛṣṭirityevaṃ vijñāte draṣṭriviṣayāṃ dṛṣṭimanyāmākāṅkṣate /
analyzed: anya jñāna anapekṣa tvāt ca na ca draṣṭuḥ nityā eva dṛṣṭiḥ iti evam vijñāte draṣṭri viṣayām dṛṣṭim anyām ākāṅkṣate
nivartate hi draṣṭu viṣaya dṛṣṭi ākāṅkṣā tad asambhavāt eva
na hi a vidyamāne viṣaye ākāṅkṣā kasyacid upajāyate
na ca dṛśyā dṛṣṭiḥ draṣṭāram viṣayīkartum utsahate
yatas tām ākāṅkṣeta
na ca svarūpa viṣaya ākhāṅkṣā svasya eva
tasmāt ajñāna adhyāropaṇa nivṛttiḥ eva ātmānam eva avet iti uktam
na ātmanaḥ viṣayīkaraṇam
tat katham avet

original: ityāha - ahaṃ dṛṣṭerdraṣṭā ātmā brahmāsmi bhavāmīti brahmeti - yatsākṣādaparokṣātsarvāntara ātmā aśanāyādyatīto neti netyasthūlamanaṇvityevamādi
analyzed: iti āha aham dṛṣṭeḥ draṣṭā ātmā brahma asmi bhavāmi iti brahma iti yat sākṣāt aparokṣāt sarva antaraḥ ātmā aśanāyādi atītaḥ na iti na iti asthūlam anaṇu iti evamādi
tat eva aham asmi
na anyaḥ saṃsārī
yathā bhavān āha iti
tasmāt evam vijñānāt tat brahma sarvam abhavat

original: tasmādyuktameva manuṣyā manyante yadbrahmavidyayā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyāma iti /
analyzed: tasmāt yuktam eva manuṣyāḥ manyante yat brahma vidyayā sarvam bhaviṣyāmaḥ iti
yat pṛṣṭam kimu tat brahma avet yasmāt tat sarvam abhavat iti

original: tannirṇītam -'brahma vā idamagra āsīt tadātmānamevāvedahaṃ brahmāsmīti tasmāttatsarvamabhavat'iti /
analyzed: tat nirṇītam brahma vai idam agre āsīt tat ātmānam eva avet aham brahma asmi iti tasmāt tat sarvam abhavat iti

original: tattatra yo yo devānāṃ madhye pratyabudhyata pratibuddhvānātmānaṃ yathoktena ātmā tadbrahmābhavat /
analyzed: tat tatra yaḥ yaḥ devānām madhye pratyabudhyata pratibuddhvān ātmānam yathā uktena ātmā tat brahma abhavat
tathā ṛpīṇām tathā manuṣyāṇām ca madhye
devānām ityādi loka dṛṣṭi apekṣayā na brahmatva buddhyā ucyate
puras puruṣaḥ āviśati iti sarvatra brahma eva anupraviṣṭam ityādi ucyate

original: paramārthatastu tatra tatra brahmaivāgra āsītprākpratibodhād devādiśarīreśvanyathaiva vibhāvyamānam /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu tatra tatra brahma eva agre āsīt prāk pratibodhāt vibhāvyamānam
tadā ātmānam eva avet tathā eva ca sarvam abhavat

original: asyā brahmavidyāyāḥ sarvabhāvāpattiḥ phalamityetasyārthasya draḍhimne mantrānudāharati śrutiḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ brahma vidyāyāḥ sarva bhāva āpattiḥ phalam iti etasya arthasya draḍhimne mantrān udāharati śrutiḥ

original: katham? tad brahma etadātmānameva'ahamasmi'iti paśyannetasmādeva brahmaṇo darśanādṛṣṭirvāmadevākhyaḥ pratipede ha pratipannavānkila /
analyzed: katham tat brahma etat ātmānam eva aham asmi iti paśyan etasmāt eva brahmaṇaḥ darśana adṛṣṭiḥ vāmadeva ākhyaḥ pratipede ha pratipannavān kila
saḥ etasmin mantrān dadarśa aham manuḥ abhavam sūryaḥ ca etya ādīn
tat etat brahma paśyan iti brahma vidyā parāmṛśyate
aham manuḥ abhavam suryaḥ ca ityādinā sarva bhāva āpattim brahma vidyā phalam parāmṛśati

original: paśyansarvātmabhāvaṃ phalaṃ pratipeda ityasmātprayogād brahmavidyāsahāyasādhanasādhyaṃ mokṣaṃ darśayati;
analyzed: paśyan sarva ātma bhāvam phalam pratipede iti asmāt prayogāt brahma vidyā sahāya sādhana sādhyam mokṣam darśayati
bhuñjānaḥ tṛpyati iti yadvat
sā iyam brahma vidyayā sarva bhāva āpattiḥ āsīt mahatām deva ādīnām vīrya atiśayāt
na idānīm aidaṃyugīnānām viśeṣataḥ manuṣyāṇām
alpa vīrya tvāt iti syāt kasyacid buddhiḥ

original: tadutthāpanāyāha- tadidaṃ prakṛtaṃ brahma yatsarvabhūtānupraviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭikriyādiliṅgam,
analyzed: tat utthāpanāya āha tat idam prakṛtam brahma yat sarva bhūta anupraviṣṭam dṛṣṭi kriyā ādi liṅgam

original: etarhyetasminnapi vartamānakāle yaḥ kaścidvyāvṛttabāhyautsukya ātmānamevaivaṃ veda'ahaṃ
analyzed: etarhi etasmin api vartamāna kāle yaḥ kaścid vyāvṛtta bāhya autsukyaḥ ātmānam eva evam veda aham
brahma asmi iti apohya upādhi janita bhrānti vijñāna adhyāropitān viśeṣān saṃsāra dharmān āgandhitam anantaram abāhyam
brahi eva aham asmi kevalam iti saḥ vidyā kṛta a sarva tva nivṛtteḥ braha a vijhānāt idam sarva bhavati

original: na hi mahāvīryeṣu vāmaḍhevādiṣu hīnavīryeṣu vā vārtamānikeṣu manuṣyeṣubrahyaṇo viśeṣastadvijhānasya vāsti /
analyzed: na hi mahā vīryeṣu vāmaḍhevādiṣu hīna vīryeṣu vā vārtamānikeṣu viśeṣaḥ tad vijhānasya vā asti

original: vārtamānikeṣu puruṣeṣu tu bahyavidyāphale anaikāntikatā śaḍkyata ityata āha-tasya
analyzed: vārtamānikeṣu puruṣeṣu tu bahi avidyā phale anaikāntika tā śaḍkyate iti atas āhatasya

original: ha brahyavijhāturyathotkena vidhinā devā mahāvīryāśca nāpi abhūtatya.abhavanāya brahyāsarvamāvasya,
analyzed: ha vidhinā devāḥ mahā vīryāḥ ca na api
na īśate na paryāptāḥ kim uta anye

original: brahyāvidyāphalaprāpyau vidhnakaraṇe devādaya īśata iti kā śaḍkā?
analyzed: brahya avidyā phala prāpyau vidhna karaṇe deva ādayaḥ īśate iti kā śaḍkā
iti ucyate deva ādīn prati ṛṇavat tvāt martyānām

śaḍkā

prabhāvavantaḥ ca hi te
nanu evam sati anyāsu api karma phala prāpti pu devānām vidhna karaṇam peya pāna samam
hanta tarhi ā visrambhaḥ bhyudaya niḥśreyasa sādhana anuṣṭhāneṣu
tathā īśvarasya ācintaya śakti tvāt vidhna karaṇe prabhu tvam
tathā kāla karma mantra oṣadhi tapasām

original: eṣāṃ hi phalasampattivipattihetutvaṃ śāstre loke ca prasidvam /

atas pi anāśvāsaḥ śāstra artha anuṣṭhāne

jagat vaicitrya darśanāt ca

deva īśvara kālāḥ tāvat na karma phala viparyāsa kartāraḥ
karmaṇām kāṅkṣita kāraka tvāt

original: karma hi śubhāśubhaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ devakāleśvarādikārakamanapekṣya nātmānaṃ prati labhate,

original: tasmātkriyānuguṇā hi deveśvarādaya iti karmasu tāvanna phalaprāptiṃ pratyavisrambhaḥ /

sva sāmarthyasya a praṇodya tvāt

original: karmakāladaivadravyādisvabhāvānāṃ guṇapradhānabhāvastvaniyato durvijñeyaśceti tatkṛto moho lokasya - karmaiva kārakaṃ nānyatphalaprāptāviti
analyzed: karma kāla daiva dravya ādi svabhāvānām guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ tu aniyataḥ durvijñeyaḥ ca iti tad kṛtaḥ mohaḥ lokasya karma eva kārakam na anyat phala prāptau iti
daivam eva iti apare
kālaḥ iti eke
dravya ādi svabhāvaḥ iti kecid
sarve ete saṃhatāḥ eva iti apare

original: tatra karmaṇaḥ prādhānyamaṅgīkṛtya vedasmṛtivādāḥ -“puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena“(bṛ.u.3 / 2 / 13) ityādayaḥ /

original: na;avidyāpagamamātratvād brahmaprāptiphalasya - yaduktaṃ brahmaprāptiphalaṃ prati devā vighnaṃ kuryuriti,
